### Co-authored Publications

```{r}
#| echo: false

suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(scholar)
  library(tidyverse)
})

id <- 'xk0Wj-0AAAAJ&h'
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
p <- get_publications(id)
pp <- p%>%
  select(year,journal,title,author,pubid)%>%
  filter(!journal=="")%>%
  arrange(desc(year))
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
knitr::kable(pp, 
             format = 'html', 
             caption = 'List of Co-Authored Publications')
```
